ComicInfo.Title: Town (part 2); Road (part 1)
ComicInfo.Series: The Tale of One Bad Rat
ComicInfo.Summary: She doesn't remember her dreams. She can't forget her nightmares. Helen Potter lived the happy life that every little girl should live, and she was going to grow up a princess. But that dream was lost amongst a nightmare of sexual abuse. Now she's on a journey to remember her dream, with her only companion a pet rat that serves as the single strong relationship on which she's trying to rebuild her sense of trust. So when her pet rat is killed by a vicious cat, things look worse for Helen. Afraid and alone once again, Helen returns to a life on the run, with the ghost of her beloved rat as her guide.
